channel.title: Jessie on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Jessie on Notes

item.title: Setup a Public Samba Share
item.description: Install Samba apt-get install samba Configure Samba Below configuration will create a new samba share which can be accessed by anybody on the network without entering any credentials.

item.title: Turn off the color with ls command
item.description: Alias See if there are any alias defined for ls on your terminal

item.title: Install Debian Jessie on WD MyCloud (Gen1)
item.description: De-attach WD Drive You will have to open your WD MyCloud device and remove the HDD or drive inside it.
